definitions.definition: Suggested without being stated directly; implicated or hinted at.
(of a proposition) to have as a necessary consequence
definitions.example: The proposition that "all dogs are mammals" implies that my dog is a mammal

definitions.definition: (of a person) to suggest by logical inference
definitions.example: When I state that your dog is brown, I am not implying that all dogs are brown

definitions.definition: (of a person or proposition) to hint; to insinuate; to suggest tacitly and avoid a direct statement
